OrgName: The NASDAQ OMX Group, Inc. and its US subsidiaries
activities: NASDAQ Inc. and its US subsidiaries use personal information concerning current, former and prospective employees, officers, directors, customers, clients, consultants, professional experts, vendors, suppliers, and complainants in connection with the management, operation and business activities,human resource administration, and safety and security measures of NASDAQ Inc. and its subsidiaries.
contacttitle1: Vice President, Head of Europe Human Resources
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Iceland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, manually processed data, human resources data, vendor and customer data, and safety and security data
recoursemech: NASDAQ Inc.'s Internal Audit Department will investigate and address unresolved complaints.  If the complaint cannot be resolved through Internal Audit, NASDAQ Inc. shall participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs).
